stepBody: Approximately what is the force due to the Bernoulli effect on a roof having an area of $$220$$ $$m^2$$? Typical air density in Boulder is $$1.14$$ $$\frac{kg}{m^3}$$, and the corresponding atmospheric pressure is 8.89×10**4 $$\frac{N}{m^2}$$. (Bernoulli’s principle as stated in the text assumes laminar flow. Using the principle here produces only an approximate result, because there is significant turbulence.)
